fields.summary: Windows: Ti.Network.HTTPClient.send fails when arg object has non-string/Blob values

comments.body:
Verified the fix. 

Ti.Network.HTTPClient.send does not fail when arg object has non-string/Blob values.
Closing.

Environment:
Appc Studio:  5.0.0.v20150819140421
Ti SDK: 5.0.0.v20150819140421
Ti CLI: 4.1.4
Alloy: 1.6.2
Windows: 8.1 Enterprise 64-bit
APPC NPM: 4.2.0-1
APPC CLI: 5.0.0-3

Device: Nokia Lumia 928 - Windows Phone 8.1
